data.title: Blood of Imam Hussain (Asws)
data.meta_description: Blood of Imam Hussain (asws) - Free download as PDF File (.pdf) or read online for free. A white bird landed on the body of Imam Hussein (as) after his martyrdom and covered its wings in his blood. It flew to where other birds were gathered and told them what happened. The birds then went to Karbala and saw Imam Hussein's body lying slaughtered. They began crying loudly and flew off with his blood on their wings, telling people of his martyrdom. One bird went to Medina and mourned at the Prophet's shrine. The people later realized this was when Imam Hussein was martyred. Another bird sat in a Jew's garden and its drops of Imam Hussein's blood healed the Jew's blind and disabled daughter, leading
